attributes.action: Punish MP's and other important political figures for using fake statistics
attributes.background: In light of the recent resurgence of Boris Johnson's false claim that the NHS will receive £350 million a week, it's time that there should be a system to punish MP's and other important political figures that use fake figures and statistics to try and persuade members of the public to their side.

rejection.details:
We understand that you are concerned about statistics used by public figures but we're not sure exactly what you'd like the UK Government or Parliament to do. 

If you'd like a body to fact-check things said during campaigning, you may wish to sign this petition: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/200053
